data.title: The Truth About Jim Carrey And Lauren Holly's Marriage
data.meta_description: This is the truth regarding Jim Carrey and Lauren Holly's marriage.
data.text:
Comedic genius Jim Carrey and his ex-wife Melissa vowed to never fall into "the pitfalls of Hollywood marriages," per The Spokesman-Review, but their marriage ended up in a nasty public divorce. According to Melissa, their split had a lot to do with Jim's "Dumb and Dumber" co-star Lauren Holly.

By the time Jim Carrey's divorce from Melissa was finalized, he was already in a relationship with Holly. Melissa accused Holly of being the third party in her and Jim's relationship, telling The Spokesman-Review that she believed Holly "may have been involved a lot sooner than they are letting on."

Holly denied Melissa's accusations, telling Rolling Stone, "They kept calling me a homewrecker. I feel for Melissa, but they were completely apart when Jim and I met." Even so, Carrey and Holly's marriage lasted only a year, and while Holly has spoken about her heartbreak, she has no hard feelings and thinks Carrey is a "genius."
